title: Exp from catching Pokemon sucks!
body:
I'm getting really good at Curveballs now, that I've been able to get some "Nice" and "Great" throws. But everytime I get a Nice or Great with a Curveball, I don't get ANY bonus exp. not even from the curveball. 

I looked it up, it says that the 3 throw bonuses (Nice, Great and Exellent) don't stack with each other. But it didn't say anything about curveballs.

I guess screw trying to be fancy. Because I'm losing exp from it lol.
